title: 86/64/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 February 1986 approving an amendment to the agricultural measures included in the integrated development programme for the Western Isles of Scotland (Outer Hebrides) pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1939/81 (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 February 1986
approving an amendment to the agricultural measures included in the integrated development programme for the Western Isles of Scotland (Outer Hebrides) pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1939/81
(Only the English text is authentic)
(86/64/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amendment of the agricultural measures included in the integrated development programme for the Western Isles of Scotland (Outer Hebrides) as communicated by the Government of the United Kingdom on 6 November 1985 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 1939/81 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 February 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 197, 20. 7. 1981, p. 6.
(2) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
